text: Thanks for stopping by for this week’s Style Scouting. My Sunday post where I share the random stuff that captured my attention or inspired me that I found online. I hope this 225th Style Scouting finds you happy, healthy and comfy-cozy while enjoying a mug filled with your favorite hot beverage. If you read the post I wrote earlier this week, you know I am in a slow January mode. Even with my intentional slowdown, I did get the finishing touches on the changes we made in the studioffice completed. The room has a new purpose and a new name. Today I am planning to take photos. I will share all about it this week. Now onto the inspiring links I found this week. Decorating This home cultivates creativity. (open in same tab) I would love to see the before photos of this beautiful home renovation. (open in same tab) This home of the co-founder of the Kate Spade brand is filled with personal style. (open in same tab) This designer’s portfolio. (open in same tab) This unique home feels like a big treehouse. (open in same tab) If you enjoy these posts – You can find past Style Scouting posts here. And… If you’re catching up on blog posts you may have missed, be sure to sign-up to get my newest posts via email to stay up to date with everything that’s happening here on the blog and more. html:
Thanks for stopping by for this week’s Style Scouting. My Sunday post where I share the random stuff that captured my attention or inspired me that I found online.

I hope this 225th Style Scouting finds you happy, healthy and comfy-cozy while enjoying a mug filled with your favorite hot beverage.

If you read the post I wrote earlier this week, you know I am in a slow January mode. Even with my intentional slowdown, I did get the finishing touches on the changes we made in the studioffice completed.

The room has a new purpose and a new name. Today I am planning to take photos. I will share all about it this week.

Now onto the inspiring links I found this week.

Decorating

This home cultivates creativity. (open in same tab)

I would love to see the before photos of this beautiful home renovation. (open in same tab)

This home of the co-founder of the Kate Spade brand is filled with personal style. (open in same tab)

This designer’s portfolio. (open in same tab)


This unique home feels like a big treehouse. (open in same tab)

If you enjoy these posts – You can find past Style Scouting posts here.

And… If you’re catching up on blog posts you may have missed, be sure to sign-up to get my newest posts via email to stay up to date with everything that’s happening here on the blog and more.
